name: Washing Machine
description: A family of 6 generates an enormous amount of laundry daily, making a reliable washing machine essential for maintaining hygiene and managing household duties efficiently. The family includes school-going children, with the youngest being 9 years old and having special needs. With children of various ages, the family faces constant washing demands from school uniforms, everyday clothing, bedding, and towels. Without a functioning washing machine, the parents would need to visit a laundromat multiple times per week, which becomes both costly and time-consuming. The expense of commercial washing services would quickly exceed the cost of a home washing machine. Furthermore, having a washing machine at home allows for better scheduling around work commitments and school routines, ensuring that clean clothes are always available when needed.

name: Washing Machine
description: A family of four has recently moved into their rental home and needs community support. With two toddlers aged 1 and 2, daily life revolves around constant washing of clothes, bedding, and essentials that come with caring for toddlers. The father is focused on establishing his career, while the mother cares for their young children. Despite their efforts, they rely on financial assistance and have minimal savings after covering rent and essentials. A washing machine (100cm height and below) would greatly improve their routine, allowing the mother to manage laundry more efficiently instead of hand-washing or using costly laundromats, which strain their limited budget and time. An example https://www.courts.com.sg/panasonic-naf80vb7hrq-top-load-washer-8kg-ip157064

name: Washing machine
description:
The client is a 35-year-old woman who is currently unemployed due to her medical conditions. She relies on financial assistance from the Social Service Office (SSO) for her livelihood. Her financial situation is compounded by her husband's inability to contribute financially, as he does not reside with her. Furthermore, the client is socially isolated and lacks family support.

She does not have the financial means to purchase a washing machine which she will need to use the public paid washing machine to do her laundry which can be costly for her since she is a Comcare beneficiary.
